overview: The story of Jiangnan lawyer Ma Rulong, who is cunning and wise, proficient in law and invincible in battle. At this time, Tang family's head  suddenly died, concubine Lian Buzhen was taken as a murderer and put in jail. Ma Rulong suspects that there is another murderer and is determined to clear her name, but unexpectedly gets into trouble.
title: Epic The Judge
